notes.title: Author Contributions
notes.p: Conceptualization, G.G., M.S., S.B., R.S.I., Y.T. and S.A.; literature review, G.G., M.S., R.S.I. and É.-D.O.; data curation, M.S., G.G., R.S.I., É.-D.O., Y.T., S.G. and E.U.; writing—original draft preparation, M.S., G.G., S.B., A.G., R.S.I. and Y.T.; writing—review and editing, G.G., M.S., Y.T., E.U., É.-D.O., S.G., R.S.I., D.A., S.B., A.G. and S.A.; project administration, G.G. All authors have read and agreed to the published version of the manuscript.
